title: Help i got a question :D
body: i dont have any friends to try this, but i was wondering if gangplank can use duskblade with Q? and if so can he use it on barrel>? like will the one who gets hit from barrel+q get duskblade on them? o,,o

replies.body: His Q should apply Duskblade, but I don't know if it'll work with the barrel.
